function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misinformation, myths, and conspiracy theories about COVID-19 leading to increased stress levels in people.","Impact":"Increased stress levels can lead to negative impacts on mental and physical health.","Mitigation":"Improved communication of accurate information, mental health support systems, and public health education.","Technologies":"AI-powered applications, blockchain for data integrity, encrypted databases for privacy protection.","People":"General public, individuals at risk of stress-related health issues.","Owner":"Public health agencies, mental health organizations, government authorities."},{"Description":"Heterogeneous data sources and the time necessary to develop AI-powered applications.","Impact":"Negatively affecting the development and application of AI-powered solutions for public health.","Mitigation":"Standardization of data formats, application of AI algorithms for data processing, and use of blockchain for data consistency.","Technologies":"Blockchain for data consistency, AI algorithms for data processing.","People":"Developers, data scientists, public health professionals.","Owner":"Tech companies, public health agencies, data management organizations."},{"Description":"Privacy concerns related to managing databases containing private health records, even in encrypted form.","Impact":"Potential security breaches, unauthorized access to sensitive health information.","Mitigation":"Strong access control measures, encryption technologies, and privacy-preserving data management strategies.","Technologies":"Encryption technologies, blockchain for data integrity, privacy-preserving data management strategies.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, data managers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, data management organizations, regulators."},{"Description":"Lack of historical data impacting the performance of data analysis models.","Impact":"Inefficient results and inaccurate predictions in data analysis models.","Mitigation":"Development of synthetic data, transfer learning, and adaptation of models for real-time analysis.","Technologies":"Synthetic data generation, transfer learning algorithms.","People":"Data scientists, public health researchers, policymakers.","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, data analytics organizations."}]}
